Articles.Content:
Hi,

I just started playing KSP and already love it

I'm the type of guy that does a lot of research beforehand so getting into my first orbits wasn't really a problem, I also already finished some docking scenarios .

I joined the forum to learn about more advanced topics that may will make my KSP journeys even more enjoyable.

Hello Kerbonavt, and welcome to the forums!

Well, if you're already doing docking, then you're well on your way to more advanced topics.

Happy landings!

Hello Kerbonavt!

We do this for sience... Kerbals like snacks, rockets and serious engineering. And there is lots to discover, many nice people and funny threads about lacking delta Vee and so on...

...one of us! one of us!!
